participant_2.background:
I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.
I've never been arrested, but I did meet one of my favorite celebrities and get his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
I live in the countryside, where there's plenty of space for my black lab to run around.
winters my favorite time of the year.
i love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.

content.text: Hi! I like folk metal, too. Who's your favorite band?
I really like Korpiklaani. I love their folk style and fun lyrics. What about you?
I love Korpiklaani, too! Turisas is my favorite. I also like Eluveitie and Finntroll.
Eluveitie is great! I haven't heard of Finntroll, I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're a Finnish folk metal band.
Cool, I'm always looking for new bands to listen to.
Do you have any other hobbies besides listening to music?
I like to go shopping and cook. I'm also a huge fan of winter sports. I live in the countryside, so I have plenty of space to go skiing and snowshoeing.
I love winter sports, too! I used to go skiing all the time when I was younger. I've never been snowshoeing, though.
Snowshoeing is a lot of fun! It's a great way to get out in nature and get some exercise.
I'll have to try it sometime. Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to read and play video games.
I love to read, too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm really into historical fiction right now. I just finished reading "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah, and I really enjoyed it.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a really good story
